recommended_degree: Psikologi, Manajemen, Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Administrasi, Ilmu Hukum (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_title: Human Resources and General Affair (HRGA) Intern
job_description:
Human Resources (HR):
- Support the recruitment process, including CV screening, interview scheduling, and candidate communication.
- Assist with new employee onboarding, such as document preparation, orientation, and initial administrative setup.
- Help manage employee data, file documents, and update HR databases.
- Support HR initiatives such as trainings, employee engagement activities, and performance evaluations.
- Assist in preparing weekly or monthly HR reports.

General Affair (GA):
- Assist in managing office operational needs (supplies, work equipment, and other facility requirements).
- Support coordination with external vendors, including requesting quotations and arranging services.
- Help organize office activities, such as meetings, internal events, and logistical arrangements.
- Assist in monitoring office cleanliness, security, and facility availability.
- Support general administrative tasks, including correspondence, documentation, and filing.
position_type: Human Resources and General Affair (HRGA) Intern
